name: The Living Space
description:
NOTE: Please allow for a few seconds (typically 8-10) between level transitions as the environment loads.

CONTROLS: 

    WASD to move around.

    ESC to quit to Main Menu.

What if our perception stopped being such a reliable tool for granting us meaning from the world? What if the orange ball is no longer simply an orange fruit but something more, something deeper?

The Living Space is a walking simulator game which gives players the freedom to explore the space at their own pace and experience it how they choose to. It avoids pushing specific objectives on players and invites them to walk around and gain their own insight from what they see and hear around them. Essentially, players can create their own ‘game’ and experience.

Through this, it challenges the preconceived goal oriented structures of a typical video game and allows players to explore freely, with no particular objective in mind.

 Do as you wish at your own pace.

Playing with headphones recommended for deeper immersive experience!
